name: DemonStar: Secret Missions 2
description:
DemonStar Secret Missions 2 is an 2005 indie top-down scrolling shooter shareware computer game was designed and developed by Mountain King Studios, Inc. It was the second spin-off game in the DemonStar Series of Secret Missions 2 from previous events that sets in the distant far future with DemonStar.
DemonStar Secret Missions 2 was released to Shareware and Commercial Full Version. Mountain King Studios games switched over from line-up game stores for local commercials. This game was shared with Raiden 2 and Raiden DX were created DemonStar sequels. An production contribution with James Emirzian Waldementer Software Co. was brought with DemonStar Secret Missions 2 as presented being creative works to DemonStar Series.
